channel.title: Save On The Persol PO2975V
channel.description: Turin 1917, Giuseppe Ratti, an optician, wanted to design practical and safe glasses for pilots and sports drivers. The Protectors were born, created with comfort, protection and optimum vision in mind. Because of their high levels of safety as well as comfort, military ofrces adopted the glasses, such as the Italian military, the US airforce [...]

item.title: Save On The Persol PO2975V
item.description:
Turin 1917, Giuseppe Ratti, an optician, wanted to design practical and safe glasses for pilots and sports drivers. The Protectors were born, created with comfort, protection and optimum vision in mind. Because of their high levels of safety as well as comfort, military ofrces adopted the glasses, such as the Italian military, the US airforce [...]
